name: Bob Find Jobs
description:
------- STORY -------

After graduating, an energetic Bob wants to challenge his limits. has been persuaded to defuse bombs on a covert mission by a senior official. to save the city's citizens from criminal groups that aim to cause chaos. Through a stealth mission, Bob gets the location of the bomb, which had been placed in the clock tower. Bob immediately began defusing the bomb.

------- Presented By -------

5CC Production from THAILAND
